MC.content: I address you w/out knowing you, something arrives [Nietzsche’s future philosophers]
MC.linkedContent: I address you w/out knowing you, something arrives [Nietzsche’s future philosophers]

MC.content: [artist as pervert?] art (particularly literature) can isolate performatively its own context for its own event > the “oeuvre”
MC.linkedContent: [artist as pervert?] art (particularly literature) can isolate performatively its own context for its own event > the “oeuvre”

POR.content: reflect on reflection, seize inaudible in sort of poetic telephony, “hear” hearing > this time of reflection is heterogeneous to what it reflects, gives time, chance of event
POR.linkedContent: reflect on reflection, seize inaudible in sort of poetic telephony, “hear” hearing > this time of reflection is heterogeneous to what it reflects, gives time, chance of event

POOF.content: Nietzsche: “Alas! if only you knew how soon, how very soon, things will be –different! –” > “what a sentence! is it a sentence?” > the sentence precipitates/precedes itself, a knowledge of a non-knowledge, an instantaneous teaching, a circle that is future-producing, instantaneous teledromatics, race finished in advance: “vibration of a shaft of writing” that promises/calls for a reading: withdraws from space by penetrating it [hymen], arrow whose flight returns to bow, as what happens in every instant—the end begins > elle se gagne de vitesse
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche: “Alas! if only you knew how soon, how very soon, things will be –different! –” > “what a sentence! is it a sentence?” > the sentence precipitates/precedes itself, a knowledge of a non-knowledge, an instantaneous teaching, a circle that is future-producing, instantaneous teledromatics, race finished in advance: “vibration of a shaft of writing” that promises/calls for a reading: withdraws from space by penetrating it [hymen], arrow whose flight returns to bow, as what happens in every instant—the end begins > elle se gagne de vitesse

POOF.content: for economic purposes, let’s call the event of such sentences: teleiopoetic
POOF.linkedContent: for economic purposes, let’s call the event of such sentences: teleiopoetic

POOF.content: teleiopoiós: that which renders absolute, perfect, complete, brings to an end; tele: distance, far-removed, spanning of space > rendering, making, transforming, producing, creating—this is what counts! > occurs in auto-tele-affection of sentence, always auto-teleipoetics, but auto is the splitting effect not simple origin [see auto-affection in VP]
POOF.linkedContent: teleiopoiós: that which renders absolute, perfect, complete, brings to an end; tele: distance, far-removed, spanning of space > rendering, making, transforming, producing, creating—this is what counts! > occurs in auto-tele-affection of sentence, always auto-teleipoetics, but auto is the splitting effect not simple origin [see auto-affection in VP]

POOF.content: that there can only be friends w/ enemies, that when one desires enemies, we can only count friends—madness looms (in every teleiopoetic event), plus de sens, empty resembles overflow
POOF.linkedContent: that there can only be friends w/ enemies, that when one desires enemies, we can only count friends—madness looms (in every teleiopoetic event), plus de sens, empty resembles overflow

POOF.content: telephone call
POOF.linkedContent: telephone call

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s teleiopoesis, a messianic structure, we establish ourselves as heralds & precursors [of ‘community of those w/out community’?], Nietzsche sometimes says “I” and sometimes “we”: singular responsibility is always double [contretemps], doubled, disseminated: double as infinitely divided responsibility
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s teleiopoesis, a messianic structure, we establish ourselves as heralds & precursors [of ‘community of those w/out community’?], Nietzsche sometimes says “I” and sometimes “we”: singular responsibility is always double [contretemps], doubled, disseminated: double as infinitely divided responsibility

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s new philosophers: something like the Messiah
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s new philosophers: something like the Messiah

POOF.content: [ethics of EROS?] double infinite responsibility: “an intertwining of temporal ekstases; a friendship to come of time w/ itself where we meet again the interlacing of the same and the tout autre (‘Grundlich-Anderes’)”
POOF.linkedContent: [ethics of EROS?] double infinite responsibility: “an intertwining of temporal ekstases; a friendship to come of time w/ itself where we meet again the interlacing of the same and the tout autre (‘Grundlich-Anderes’)”

POOF.content: Derrida countersigns Nietzsche [re: arrivant thinkers, new philosophers], extends the duty to countersign again, to us, to me, to you, teleiopoetically: friendship w/out friendship of friends of solitude
POOF.linkedContent: Derrida countersigns Nietzsche [re: arrivant thinkers, new philosophers], extends the duty to countersign again, to us, to me, to you, teleiopoetically: friendship w/out friendship of friends of solitude

POOF.content: already of perhaps paradoxical force of teleiopoetic propulsion: makes arrivant come by withdrawing, produces an event > teleiopoesis also defines a structure of political allocution, a politics of friendship, a ‘great politics’
POOF.linkedContent: already of perhaps paradoxical force of teleiopoetic propulsion: makes arrivant come by withdrawing, produces an event > teleiopoesis also defines a structure of political allocution, a politics of friendship, a ‘great politics’

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s unbelievable teleiopoesis: mad “I”, suspended “we”
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s unbelievable teleiopoesis: mad “I”, suspended “we”

POOF.content: [re: Schmitt] structural disavowal that informs/constructs political discourse [that theory of politics must be performed, sides must be taken], principle of affirmation & ruin at heart of most coherent gestures > figure of tautology we were calling teleiopoetic [?]
POOF.linkedContent: [re: Schmitt] structural disavowal that informs/constructs political discourse [that theory of politics must be performed, sides must be taken], principle of affirmation & ruin at heart of most coherent gestures > figure of tautology we were calling teleiopoetic [?]

POOF.content: Derrida links logic of Schmitt’s decisionism to Nietzsche’s teleiopoetic, quasi-messianic perhaps: its actual/effective unveiling need only be possible for it to occur > thus, decisionism is haunted by law of spectrality
POOF.linkedContent: Derrida links logic of Schmitt’s decisionism to Nietzsche’s teleiopoetic, quasi-messianic perhaps: its actual/effective unveiling need only be possible for it to occur > thus, decisionism is haunted by law of spectrality

POOF.content: difference btwn talking to them [o my friends/enemies] & speaking of them [there are no friends/enemies]: world of difference, fort/da, record their absence after having called ——the contretemps [appealing to other presupposes his presence, allows him to come, while distancing/retarding his arrival] dictates, as insane as it is inevitable, the teleiopoetic sentence > expectation of Messiah as unbearable terror: hatred of what is thus awaited?
POOF.linkedContent: difference btwn talking to them [o my friends/enemies] & speaking of them [there are no friends/enemies]: world of difference, fort/da, record their absence after having called ——the contretemps [appealing to other presupposes his presence, allows him to come, while distancing/retarding his arrival] dictates, as insane as it is inevitable, the teleiopoetic sentence > expectation of Messiah as unbearable terror: hatred of what is thus awaited?

POOF.content: teleiopoesis carries w/in it an irresistible disavowal, fearing all the chance & threat of the perhaps?: the called converted to the repressed, friend into enemy
POOF.linkedContent: teleiopoesis carries w/in it an irresistible disavowal, fearing all the chance & threat of the perhaps?: the called converted to the repressed, friend into enemy

POOF.content: to renounce desire, must command the other to be free, to address the other qua other, command him to be capable of not answering, double bind [eg. don’t answer my phone call]
POOF.linkedContent: to renounce desire, must command the other to be free, to address the other qua other, command him to be capable of not answering, double bind [eg. don’t answer my phone call]

POOF.content: “O my friends…” a call, a promise, a prayer (eukhé) [neither true nor false, Aristotle] > can’t give friendship, were friendship not still to come [Heideggerian ek-stasis] > in the name of friendship, “no friend” respectfully declares the perfect sovereign friendship impossible
POOF.linkedContent: “O my friends…” a call, a promise, a prayer (eukhé) [neither true nor false, Aristotle] > can’t give friendship, were friendship not still to come [Heideggerian ek-stasis] > in the name of friendship, “no friend” respectfully declares the perfect sovereign friendship impossible

POOF.content: vous-mes-amis-soyez-mes-amis-et-bien-que-vous-ne-le-soyez-pas-encore-vous-l’êtes-déjà-puisque-je-vous-appelle-ainsi: “O my friends…” has structure & temporality of messianic teleiopoesis
POOF.linkedContent: vous-mes-amis-soyez-mes-amis-et-bien-que-vous-ne-le-soyez-pas-encore-vous-l’êtes-déjà-puisque-je-vous-appelle-ainsi: “O my friends…” has structure & temporality of messianic teleiopoesis

POOF.content: for Nietzsche, if woman is not even part of humanity [via inability to befriend], man is not yet man either, men are equally late [Augustine], though woman lagging > be patient in the face of this ‘not yet’: mourned anticipation, a threshold naming—May we have it one day!
POOF.linkedContent: for Nietzsche, if woman is not even part of humanity [via inability to befriend], man is not yet man either, men are equally late [Augustine], though woman lagging > be patient in the face of this ‘not yet’: mourned anticipation, a threshold naming—May we have it one day!

POOF.content: via Nietzsche, friendship is a thing of distance, a thing of the future: friends ready to hear will be ready when they have heard the teleiopetic word
POOF.linkedContent: via Nietzsche, friendship is a thing of distance, a thing of the future: friends ready to hear will be ready when they have heard the teleiopetic word

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s teleipoetic word accomplishes Gospel word in perverting it: promises spiritual fraternity, beyond milk & blood (owing to another blood, another eucharistic body [?])
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s teleipoetic word accomplishes Gospel word in perverting it: promises spiritual fraternity, beyond milk & blood (owing to another blood, another eucharistic body [?])

POOF.content: Nietzsche’s Superman: awaited because he is origin/cause of man, Ursache, this friend promised via messianico-teleiopeotic perhaps, immemorially past > this friendship to come would still be too human, still deserves name ‘friendship’ [anthropological, humanist character of friendship is situated/delimited here, friendship of proximity/presence]
POOF.linkedContent: Nietzsche’s Superman: awaited because he is origin/cause of man, Ursache, this friend promised via messianico-teleiopeotic perhaps, immemorially past > this friendship to come would still be too human, still deserves name ‘friendship’ [anthropological, humanist character of friendship is situated/delimited here, friendship of proximity/presence]

POOF.content: Zarathustra always called us, supposing it teleiopoetically, under neutral, non-dialecticizable law of pas and ‘X w/out X’
POOF.linkedContent: Zarathustra always called us, supposing it teleiopoetically, under neutral, non-dialecticizable law of pas and ‘X w/out X’

POOF.content: when will we be ready for an experience of freedom & equality that’s capable of respectfully experiencing the friendship that would at last be just, just beyond law, measured against its measurelessness? > “O my democratic friends…”
POOF.linkedContent: when will we be ready for an experience of freedom & equality that’s capable of respectfully experiencing the friendship that would at last be just, just beyond law, measured against its measurelessness? > “O my democratic friends…”

SW.content: I do not foresee the future thus promised, I foretell it
SW.linkedContent: I do not foresee the future thus promised, I foretell it

SW.content: the gage of my foretelling destines: calls to make come, beyond any truth of ontological revelation
SW.linkedContent: the gage of my foretelling destines: calls to make come, beyond any truth of ontological revelation

SW.content: it destines itself to those men & women who will know how to read, of course—knowing how to read (voilà, the circle) only on basis of gage given > reading finally what you have to read
SW.linkedContent: it destines itself to those men & women who will know how to read, of course—knowing how to read (voilà, the circle) only on basis of gage given > reading finally what you have to read

SPEC.content: [see also SPEC in (AUTO)BIOGRAPHY] greatest pleasure, play w/ the dummy (le mort), [Ernst, Freud] speaks to himself telephonically, make himself re-, acc. law of PP: signing, contracting w/ himself
SPEC.linkedContent: [see also SPEC in (AUTO)BIOGRAPHY] greatest pleasure, play w/ the dummy (le mort), [Ernst, Freud] speaks to himself telephonically, make himself re-, acc. law of PP: signing, contracting w/ himself

SPEC.content: [Freud’s speculation on Ernst] needs no witness, no counter-testimony has weight before this teleological auto-institution
SPEC.linkedContent: [Freud’s speculation on Ernst] needs no witness, no counter-testimony has weight before this teleological auto-institution

SPEC.content: net (filet) is in place, one pulls on a string (fil), getting a hand, foot, caught: c’est un lasso ou un lacet > Freud caught himself in advance; rapporté différé (deferred overlapping) > describing in advance scene of its own description——an abyss of more than one generation [Freud & Ernst] (also said about computers), an a priori of an aftereffect (d’un après-coup) [Derrida doing this too?] > formal structure se donne à lire once objects can substitute for each other (laying bare substitutive structure itself)
SPEC.linkedContent: net (filet) is in place, one pulls on a string (fil), getting a hand, foot, caught: c’est un lasso ou un lacet > Freud caught himself in advance; rapporté différé (deferred overlapping) > describing in advance scene of its own description——an abyss of more than one generation [Freud & Ernst] (also said about computers), an a priori of an aftereffect (d’un après-coup) [Derrida doing this too?] > formal structure se donne à lire once objects can substitute for each other (laying bare substitutive structure itself)

SPEC.content: classically [?]: art preserves proper name, science forgets proper name > what then is psychoanalysis?
SPEC.linkedContent: classically [?]: art preserves proper name, science forgets proper name > what then is psychoanalysis?

SPEC.content: payer la science de son proper nom, science of his [Freud’s] proper name (propre nom) inseparable from nom propre: speculation, pay in advance the charges for a return to sender: reste à s’avoir (it remains to be had/seen/known)
SPEC.linkedContent: payer la science de son proper nom, science of his [Freud’s] proper name (propre nom) inseparable from nom propre: speculation, pay in advance the charges for a return to sender: reste à s’avoir (it remains to be had/seen/known)

SPEC.content: “il s’envoie—et la poste fait suivre, elle ne donne ni ne demande jamais d’acquit définitif pour le solde du mandat” [sends himself w/out acquittance to meet the balance]
SPEC.linkedContent: “il s’envoie—et la poste fait suivre, elle ne donne ni ne demande jamais d’acquit définitif pour le solde du mandat” [sends himself w/out acquittance to meet the balance]

SPEC.content: demon, revenance which repeats its entrance, revient w/out having been called by PP > like Socrates’ demon, which made everyone write, this automaton produces effects of ventriloquism, w/out origin, emission, addressee, tele w/out telos
SPEC.linkedContent: demon, revenance which repeats its entrance, revient w/out having been called by PP > like Socrates’ demon, which made everyone write, this automaton produces effects of ventriloquism, w/out origin, emission, addressee, tele w/out telos

SPEC.content: demonic in scene of writing/inheritance: en se précédant de son annonce auprès de qui tient lieu prêt pour sa revenue [announcement for those who will hold its place when it comes back] > hope that message will become archival, or indestructible monument of interrupted en-voie
SPEC.linkedContent: demonic in scene of writing/inheritance: en se précédant de son annonce auprès de qui tient lieu prêt pour sa revenue [announcement for those who will hold its place when it comes back] > hope that message will become archival, or indestructible monument of interrupted en-voie

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s Beyond…] speculating, “author” already no longer there, no longer responsible, leaves document in your hands > “literary”: make of it what you will, it’s up to you—you’re more than ever on board
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s Beyond…] speculating, “author” already no longer there, no longer responsible, leaves document in your hands > “literary”: make of it what you will, it’s up to you—you’re more than ever on board

SPEC.content: [re: Freud’s Beyond…] you carry (vous portez) his name, until the end of time you will formulate theory carrying his name > ruse infinie (more tricky than itself)
SPEC.linkedContent: [re: Freud’s Beyond…] you carry (vous portez) his name, until the end of time you will formulate theory carrying his name > ruse infinie (more tricky than itself)

SPEC.content: capital front [bobine (Ernst’s spool) as face, cap as head], where PP might be placed out of action > to rout a mastery, so one doesn’t just end up w/ one’s couriers, offspring, lieutenants
SPEC.linkedContent: capital front [bobine (Ernst’s spool) as face, cap as head], where PP might be placed out of action > to rout a mastery, so one doesn’t just end up w/ one’s couriers, offspring, lieutenants

SPEC.content: Freud’s  metaphor of the “vesicle,” protoplasmic bulb, amortizes excitations from outside world [and inside], protects, can be transferred to every corpus [i.e. text]: transference from one legatee to the other, like the simulacrum of secret
SPEC.linkedContent: Freud’s metaphor of the “vesicle,” protoplasmic bulb, amortizes excitations from outside world [and inside], protects, can be transferred to every corpus [i.e. text]: transference from one legatee to the other, like the simulacrum of secret

SPEC.content: Vorbilder (models), necessity of metaphoric detour whenever Freud doesn’t know what he’s talking about re: interminable band, contra-band, quantity of binding—so he uses rhetoric of code, message, envoi, postal network
SPEC.linkedContent: Vorbilder (models), necessity of metaphoric detour whenever Freud doesn’t know what he’s talking about re: interminable band, contra-band, quantity of binding—so he uses rhetoric of code, message, envoi, postal network

SPEC.content: demonic, archive of its own demon: undissolved transference, like unpaid debt of inheritance, one can begin an inheritance thus: laissée en sommeil, la menace ainsi enkystée [pocket]
SPEC.linkedContent: demonic, archive of its own demon: undissolved transference, like unpaid debt of inheritance, one can begin an inheritance thus: laissée en sommeil, la menace ainsi enkystée [pocket]

FV.content: dead king, Freud, only one to contract w/ himself, awaits restitution > restoration: carrying off last plume w/ his 1st hand [in dying, mobilizes many]: theory of the facteurs
FV.linkedContent: dead king, Freud, only one to contract w/ himself, awaits restitution > restoration: carrying off last plume w/ his 1st hand [in dying, mobilizes many]: theory of the facteurs
